title: The Sandhills of Arabia
description: FALL IN LOVE WITH SHAHEEDAH AND MARY AS THEY SEARCHFOR DEVOTION AND TRUTH IN THE ARABIAN PENINSULA.The Sandhills of Arabia presents the story of the friendship of two girls, Shaheedah and Mary, in the Arabian peninsula. It tells of love, truth and the struggle to find their identities in the midst of Saddamâ€™s invasion of Kuwait and US espionage.
author: Laila Hasib
